definition: The Gallant Maid, novel by Manchu-born Qing dynasty writer 文康[Wen2 Kang1]

sentences.english: Seeing their children get married will always be their top concern.
sentences.chinese: 兒女的婚姻大事，永遠都是他們最關心的事情。

sentences.english: It is the same with our children.
sentences.chinese: 人各有志，不必強求，對兒女也是如此。

sentences.english: May his children be wandering beggars; may they be driven from their ruined homes.
sentences.chinese: 願他的兒女漂流討飯，從他們荒涼之處出來求食。

sentences.english: Suddenly the father put down a bowl chopsticks, son some surprise gain ground.
sentences.chinese: 忽然父親放下碗筷，兒女有些驚喜地擡頭。

sentences.english: The third part of "The Cartoon of Kids of Family" is almost the same as the real-life version.
sentences.chinese: 《家有兒女動畫版》第三部劇情基本跟真人版一致。

sentences.english: But that son is now a junior in high school, and he won't be in the house forever.
sentences.chinese: 不過小兒女如今已經上了高外，他不會永久呆在家裏。

sentences.english: As the writer states, we are being treated as heirs or sons of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 正如作者所述，我們被接納爲天國的兒女和後嗣。

sentences.english: You know that your wife and children come first .
sentences.chinese: 你要知道首先要考慮的是你的妻子兒女。

sentences.english: And then having Him chasten and correct you as His child.
sentences.chinese: 然後讓神來象對兒女一樣潔淨你，管教你。

sentences.english: sons and daughters of China opened a prelude to invasion.
sentences.chinese: 虎門銷煙揭開了中華兒女反侵略的序幕。

sentences.english: Now is the time to lift our nation from the quicksands of racial injustice to the solid rock of brotherhood.
sentences.chinese: 現在是向上帝所有的兒女開放機會之門的時候。

sentences.english: Does God really treat his children that way?
sentences.chinese: 上帝真會這樣對待他的兒女嗎？

sentences.english: Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.
sentences.chinese: 你們作兒女的，要在主裏聽從父母，這是理所當然的。

sentences.english: Fathers do not embitter your children, or they will become discouraged.
sentences.chinese: 你們做父親的，不要惹兒女的氣，恐怕他們失了志氣。

sentences.english: Lee hopes futilely to read aloud children but don'ts think of a wife, make the wife more angry.
sentences.chinese: 李白想念兒女卻不想念妻子，讓妻子更爲惱火。

sentences.english: What the great news for Kate, she has a boy and a daughter now.
sentences.chinese: 對凱特來說這是個多麼好的消息啊，如今她兒女雙全。

definition: a relative (i.e. family relation)/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],位[wei4]

Sun Tzu, also known as Sun Wu 孫武|孙武[Sun1 Wu3] (c. 500 BC, dates of birth and death uncertain), general, strategist and philosopher of the Spring and Autumn Period (700-475 BC), believed to be the author of the “Art of War” 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3], one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1]
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
to worry about/to be concerned about
